item.title: Errors after following a tut
item.dc:creator: @zRickyz zRickyz
item.description:
@zRickyz wrote:

Alright so I followed a tutorial to add an “Open” option on Christmas Crackers. I did all the server sided stuff with no problems but the one code I had to put client sided gave errors. Now this tut is a year old so I don’t see me getting any help by posting on the thread so I’m hoping one of you guys could give me your opinion why these errors are coming up.

The tutorial said under this code:

} switch (itemDef.id) {

Add this:

case 962: itemDef.name = "Christmas cracker"; itemDef.description = "A christmas cracker from the 2012 Christmas event."; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Open"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; break;

So mine looks like this:

[code] }
switch (itemDef.id) {

	case 962:
		itemDef.name = "Christmas cracker";
		itemDef.description = "A christmas cracker from the 2012 Christmas event.";
		itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
		itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";
		itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
		itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Open";
		itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop";
	break;
			

	case 11722:
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = itemDef.maleEquip1;
		itemDef.femaleEquip2 = itemDef.maleEquip2;
	break;

			
}[/code]

And these are the errors I got when compiling:

Read full topic
